710.text: I'm just gonna, kind of, end with a quote.

712.text: This is a quote from Mark Twain.

715.text: you'll be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do

717.text: than by the ones you did do.

719.text: So, throw off the bowline, sail away from the safe harbor

722.text: catch the trade winds in your sails.

727.text: And then to add, in my own words

729.text: kind of what I learned from this trip is--

731.text: Don't let the fear of failure stop you.

734.text: Fear of failure is a really powerful thing.

739.text: But, there's no courage, without fear.

741.text: So, embrace the fear, love the suffering, take a risk

746.text: laugh at yourself, a lot. And dive in and try

750.text:
'cause, you'll never have an
adventure without a little fear.
